about_the_game:
Dive into the shadowy depths of crime! Your name still makes countless criminals tremble at the sound of it. But there are others who commit crimes with cold calculation, trying to outsmart you. Prove them wrong! This new collection of crime episodes is full of terrifying and bone-chilling murders, break-ins, and robberies. We believe you are the only one who can stop the perpetrators, but just in case, we've sent Paul to you for backup. Your faithful partner will be there to assist you or even bring you a new case.

This Collector's Edition includes:

♟️ Engrossing Crime Investigation!
Step into the shoes of a legendary detective whose reputation sends shivers down the spines of criminals. Navigate through chilling crime scenes and unravel complex criminal cases designed to test your investigative prowess!

♟️ Brain-Teasing Puzzles!
Engage in a variety of puzzles and brain teasers that challenge your logic and deductive reasoning. Each puzzle brings you closer to capturing the culprits and ensuring justice!

♟️ Dynamic Storytelling!
Immerse yourself in a narrative full of twists and extraordinary connections. Discover how each decision shapes the outcome, influencing the future of both the perpetrator and the victim!

♟️ Hidden Object Challenges!
Sharpen your observational skills in detailed locations filled with hidden object games. Scour crime scenes to find hidden objects that are key to unlocking the mysteries and solving the cases!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey through a maze of deceit and intrigue. Can you maintain your stellar reputation and put an end to these meticulously planned crimes?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
